00026 #ifndef CLIENTTAGS_H
00027 #define CLIENTTAGS_H
00028 
00029 enum client_tags {
00030     CT_NAME             = 0x01,
00031     CT_SERVER_UDPSEARCH_FLAGS   = 0x0E,
00032     CT_PORT             = 0x0F,
00033     CT_VERSION          = 0x11,
00034     CT_SERVER_FLAGS         = 0x20, // currently only used to inform a server about supported features
00035     CT_EMULECOMPAT_OPTIONS      = 0xEF,
00036     CT_EMULE_RESERVED1      = 0xF0,
00037     CT_EMULE_RESERVED2      = 0xF1,
00038     CT_EMULE_RESERVED3      = 0xF2,
00039     CT_EMULE_RESERVED4      = 0xF3,
00040     CT_EMULE_RESERVED5      = 0xF4,
00041     CT_EMULE_RESERVED6      = 0xF5,
00042     CT_EMULE_RESERVED7      = 0xF6,
00043     CT_EMULE_RESERVED8      = 0xF7,
00044     CT_EMULE_RESERVED9      = 0xF8,
00045     CT_EMULE_UDPPORTS       = 0xF9,
00046     CT_EMULE_MISCOPTIONS1       = 0xFA,
00047     CT_EMULE_VERSION        = 0xFB,
00048     CT_EMULE_BUDDYIP        = 0xFC,
00049     CT_EMULE_BUDDYUDP       = 0xFD,
00050     CT_EMULE_MISCOPTIONS2       = 0xFE,
00051     CT_EMULE_RESERVED13     = 0xFF
00052 };

00054 // Old MuleInfo tags
00055 enum MuleInfo_tags {
00056     ET_COMPRESSION      = 0x20u,
00057     ET_UDPPORT      = 0x21u,
00058     ET_UDPVER       = 0x22u,
00059     ET_SOURCEEXCHANGE   = 0x23u,
00060     ET_COMMENTS     = 0x24u,
00061     ET_EXTENDEDREQUEST  = 0x25u,
00062     ET_COMPATIBLECLIENT = 0x26u,
00063     ET_FEATURES     = 0x27u,    
00064     ET_MOD_VERSION      = 0x55u,
00065     // ET_FEATURESET    = 0x54u,    // int - [Bloodymad Featureset] // UNUSED
00066     ET_OS_INFO      = 0x94u     // Reused rand tag (MOD_OXY), because the type is unknown
00067 };

00069 // Server capabilities, values for CT_SERVER_FLAGS
00070 enum ServerCapabilites {
00071     SRVCAP_ZLIB     = 0x0001,
00072     SRVCAP_IP_IN_LOGIN  = 0x0002,
00073     SRVCAP_AUXPORT      = 0x0004,
00074     SRVCAP_NEWTAGS      = 0x0008,
00075     SRVCAP_UNICODE      = 0x0010,
00076     SRVCAP_LARGEFILES   = 0x0100,
00077     SRVCAP_SUPPORTCRYPT = 0x0200,
00078     SRVCAP_REQUESTCRYPT = 0x0400,
00079     SRVCAP_REQUIRECRYPT = 0x0800
00080 };
00081 
00082 // aMule used to use these names
00083 #define CAPABLE_ZLIB            SRVCAP_ZLIB
00084 #define CAPABLE_IP_IN_LOGIN_FRAME   SRVCAP_IP_IN_LOGIN
00085 #define CAPABLE_AUXPORT         SRVCAP_AUXPORT
00086 #define CAPABLE_NEWTAGS         SRVCAP_NEWTAGS
00087 #define CAPABLE_UNICODE         SRVCAP_UNICODE
00088 #define CAPABLE_LARGEFILES      SRVCAP_LARGEFILES
